sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM , A.RA_YY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RA_EVL_ST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') RA_EVL_ST_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RA_EVL_ED_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') RA_EVL_ED_DT , A.RA_SCHD_UPD_RSN , B.INTG_IDVD_CNM RA_EVL_PRG , A.RA_EVL_PRG_STSC , A.RA_SCHD_UPD_RSN FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RA_EVL_PRG_STSC = TRIM(B.IDVDC_VAL) AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'RA_EVL_PRG_STSC' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#sch_ra_yy#)||'%%'

sql.data: AND A.RA_YY = TRIM(#st_ra_yy#)

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: AND A.RA_EVL_PRG_STSC = TRIM(#st_ra_evl_prg#)

sql.name: SQL14
sql.data: ORDER BY A.RA_YY DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM, A.RSK_C, B1.RSK_PFRNM F_PFRNM, B2.RSK_PFRNM S_PFRNM, B3.RSK_PFRNM , A.BZPL_ACS_IMP_YN, A.HMRS_LSS_YN, A.IPT_RESC_IPMT_YN , A.SYS_UG_IMP_YN, A.DOFE_SPT_SSP_YN, A.BCP_AMN_OBJ_YN , A.RA_X_RSNC, A.X_RSNCTT, A.NATV_RSK_EVL_SCR, A.RSK_CTL_SUV_CNTN , A.RM_RSK_EVL_SCR, C.RM_RSK_GRDNM, A.RM_RSK_GRD_C , A.RSK_MTG_ACT_CNTN, E.RA_DCZ_STSC, F.CHRG_EMPNM, F.ENO, F.TEAM_CD, G.BRNM FROM TB_OR_BH_RA A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RSK_C = B3.RSK_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_RSK_C = B2.RSK_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_RSK_C = B1.RSK_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_BC_RMRSK_GRD C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RM_RSK_GRD_C = C.RM_RSK_GRD_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RA D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = D.BAS_YM INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RADCZ E ON D.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND SUBSTR(D.BAS_YM,0,4) = SUBSTR(E.BAS_YM,0,4) AND D.DCZ_SQNO = E.DCZ_SQNO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_c AND F.ENO = A.VLR_ENO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ G ON A.GRP_ORG_C = G.GRP_ORG_C AND F.TEAM_CD = G.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%' ORDER BY A.RSK_C

sql.data: SELECT A.BCP_IFN_DSC , B.BCP_IFN_DSNM , B.BCP_IFN_DS_CNTN , (A.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO*100) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO FROM TB_OR_BH_SSPIFN_WVAL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BM_SSPIFN B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BCP_IFN_DSC = B.BCP_IFN_DSC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#bia_evl_year#) ORDER BY A.BCP_IFN_DSC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_RA SET BZPL_ACS_IMP_YN = TRIM(#bzpl_acs_imp_yn#) , HMRS_LSS_YN = TRIM(#hmrs_lss_yn#) , IPT_RESC_IPMT_YN = TRIM(#ipt_resc_ipmt_yn#) , SYS_UG_IMP_YN = TRIM(#sys_ug_imp_yn#) , DOFE_SPT_SSP_YN = TRIM(#dofe_spt_ssp_yn#) , BCP_AMN_OBJ_YN = TRIM(#bcp_amn_obj_yn#) , RA_X_RSNC = TRIM(#ra_x_rsnc#) , X_RSNCTT = TRIM(#x_rsnctt#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%' AND RSK_C = TRIM(#rsk_c#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OM_SCHD SET RA_SCHD_UPD_RSN = TRIM(#ra_schd_upd_rsn#) , RA_EVL_ST_DT = TRIM(REPLACE(#ra_evl_st_dt#,'-','')) , RA_EVL_ED_DT = TRIM(REPLACE(#ra_evl_ed_dt#,'-','')) , RA_EVL_PRG_STSC = '02' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND RA_YY LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%'

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BH_RADCZ ( GRP_ORG_C, RSK_C, BAS_YM, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_DT , DCZMN_ENO, RA_DCZ_STSC , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#rsk_c#) , ( SELECT BAS_YM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND RA_YY LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%' ) , ( SELECT MAX(DCZ_SQNO)+1 FROM TB_OR_BH_RADCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%' ) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , TRIM(#userid#), '02' , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_RA SET DCZ_SQNO = DCZ_SQNO+1 , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%'

sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_RA SET VLR_ENO = TRIM(#sch_vlr_eno#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#ra_evl_year#)||'%%' AND RSK_C = TRIM(#sch_rsk_c#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV1, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV2, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV3, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV4, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.BRC, A.BRNM , A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC, A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_C, A.QSN_RG_YN, A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC, A.BIA_EVL_PRG, A.ALL_RANK , B.BSN_COIC_YN1, B.BSN_COIC_YN2, B.BSN_COIC_YN3, B.BSN_COIC_YN4, B.BSN_COIC_YN5 , C.BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO1, C.BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO2, C.BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO3, C.BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO4, C.BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO5 , D.IFN_COIC_YN1, D.IFN_COIC_YN2, D.IFN_COIC_YN3, D.IFN_COIC_YN4, D.IFN_COIC_YN5 , E.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO1, E.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO2, E.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO3, E.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO4, E.BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO5, A.CHRG_EMPNM, A.ENO, A.BIA_EVL_ED_DT FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BAS_YM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, A.BRC, D.BRNM, A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC , A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_C, A.QSN_RG_YN, A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC, E.INTG_IDVD_CNM BIA_EVL_PRG , RANK () OVER( ORDER BY (A.BSN_TP_IPTD_VAL+A.BSN_SSP_IFN_VAL) DESC ) ALL_RANK, F.CHRG_EMPNM, F.ENO, F.TEAM_CD, G.BIA_EVL_ED_DT FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = D.BRC AND D.UYN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC = E.IDVDC_VAL AND E.INTG_GRP_C = 'BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_c AND F.ENO = A.VLR_ENO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_SCHD G ON A.GRP_ORG_C = G.GRP_ORG_C AND G.BIA_YY = TRIM(#st_bia_yy#) WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' AND A.BRC = TRIM(#brc#) ) A , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , BSN_PRSS_C , BRC , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '01', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '02', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '03', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '04', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '05', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN5 FROM TB_OR_BH_BSNTP_EVL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC ) B , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '01', BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '02', BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '03', BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '04', BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '05', BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_TP_WVAL_RTO5 FROM TB_OR_BH_BSNTP_WVAL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C ) C , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , BSN_PRSS_C , BRC , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '01', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '02', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '03', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '04', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '05', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN5 FROM TB_OR_BH_SSPIFN_EVL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC ) D , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '01', BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '02', BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '03', BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '04', BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '05', BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO)) BSN_SSP_IFN_WVAL_RTO5 FROM TB_OR_BH_SSPIFN_WVAL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C ) E WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.BRC = B.BRC(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B.BSN_PRSS_C(+) AND A.BRC = B.BRC(+) AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C(+)

sql.data: SELECT A.DSQNO, A.RCVR_HMRS_DSC, A.BRC, C.BRNM, A.ENO, B.CHRG_EMPNM, D.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS PZCNM , A.CHRG_BSNNM, A.MPNO, A.EMAIL_ADR, A.OHSE_ADR, A.OHSE_TELNO FROM TB_OR_BH_NED_HMRS A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ENO = B.ENO INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D ON B.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND D.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' AND D.IDVDC_VAL = B.PZCC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#chrg_brc#) ORDER BY A.DSQNO

sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_PALS_RLR SET CONM = TRIM(#conm#) , DEPTNM = TRIM(#deptnm#) , CHRG_EMPNM = TRIM(#chrg_empnm#) , PZCNM = TRIM(#pzcnm#) , CHRG_BSNNM = TRIM(#chrg_bsnnm#) , EMAIL_ADR = TRIM(#email_adr#) , MPNO = TRIM(#mpno#) , OFFC_TELNO = TRIM(#offc_telno#) , FIR_INP_DTM = SYSDATE , FIR_INPMN_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#hd_bia_yy#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno3#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE ( GRP_ORG_C, BIA_YY, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC, DSQNO , BZS_DEVCNM, QT, UG_UZ_EXPL , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#hd_bia_yy#), TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#brc#), NVL(MAX(DSQNO),0)+1 , TRIM(#bzs_devcnm#), TRIM(#qt#), TRIM(#ug_uz_expl#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#hd_bia_yy#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#)

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#hd_bia_yy#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno4#)

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE SET BZS_DEVCNM = TRIM(#bzs_devcnm#) , QT = TRIM(#qt#) , UG_UZ_EXPL = TRIM(#ug_uz_expl#) , FIR_INP_DTM = SYSDATE , FIR_INPMN_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#hd_bia_yy#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#hd_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno4#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT BIA_YY, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(BIA_YY,0,4),'-'),SUBSTR(BIA_YY,5,6)) EVL_SC , ( SELECT MAX(BIA_YY) FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_EVL_ED_DT LIKE CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), '%%') )MAX_EVL_SC FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ORDER BY BIA_YY DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV1, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV2, A.BSN_PRSNM_LV3, A.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , A.BSN_PRSS_LV1, A.BSN_PRSS_LV2, A.BSN_PRSS_LV3,A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.BRC CHRG_BRC, A.BRNM , A.BSN_TP_IPTD_VAL, A.BSN_SSP_IFN_VAL, A.ALL_RANK, A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC, A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_C , A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_NM, A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_NM, A.FIR_OBT_RCVR_HR_C, A.OBT_RCVR_HR_C, A.QSN_RG_YN, A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC , A.F_BSN_PRSNM_LV1, A.F_BSN_PRSNM_LV2, A.F_BSN_PRSNM_LV3, A.F_BSN_PRSNM , A.F_BSN_PRSS_LV1, A.F_BSN_PRSS_LV2, A.F_BSN_PRSS_LV3, A.F_BSN_PRSS_C, A.PRCD_BRC PRD_BRC , B.BSN_COIC_YN1, B.BSN_COIC_YN2, B.BSN_COIC_YN3, B.BSN_COIC_YN4, B.BSN_COIC_YN5 , C.IFN_COIC_YN1, C.IFN_COIC_YN2, C.IFN_COIC_YN3, C.IFN_COIC_YN4, C.IFN_COIC_YN5, A.CHRG_EMPNM, A.ENO, A.BIA_EVL_PRG FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BAS_YM, B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2, B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3 , B.BSN_PRSNM, B1.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV2, B3.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV3, A.BSN_PRSS_C , A.BRC, C.BRNM, A.BSN_TP_IPTD_VAL, A.BSN_SSP_IFN_VAL , RANK() OVER( ORDER BY (A.BSN_TP_IPTD_VAL+BSN_SSP_IFN_VAL) DESC) ALL_RANK , A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC, A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_C, D1.INTG_IDVD_CNM MAX_PMSS_SSP_NM, D2.INTG_IDVD_CNM OBT_RCVR_PTM_NM , A.FIR_OBT_RCVR_HR_C, A.OBT_RCVR_HR_C, A.QSN_RG_YN, A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC, F.BSN_PRSNM F_BSN_PRSNM , E.BSN_PRSS_C F_BSN_PRSS_C, F1.BSN_PRSNM F_BSN_PRSNM_LV1, F2.BSN_PRSNM F_BSN_PRSNM_LV2, F3.BSN_PRSNM F_BSN_PRSNM_LV3 , F1.BSN_PRSS_C F_BSN_PRSS_LV1, F2.BSN_PRSS_C F_BSN_PRSS_LV2, F3.BSN_PRSS_C F_BSN_PRSS_LV3, E.PRCD_BRC, G.CHRG_EMPNM, G.ENO, D3.INTG_IDVD_CNM BIA_EVL_PRG FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B.BSN_PRSS_C AND B.LVL_NO = 4 AND B.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = 3 AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = 2 AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = 1 AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D1 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D1.GRP_ORG_C AND A.MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC = D1.IDVDC_VAL AND D1.INTG_GRP_C = 'MAX_PMSS_SSP_PRDC' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OBT_RCVR_PTM_C = D2.IDVDC_VAL AND D2.INTG_GRP_C = 'OBT_RCVR_PTM_C' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC = D3.IDVDC_VAL AND D3.INTG_GRP_C = 'BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_BH_PRCD_BSN E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = E.BAS_YM AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = E.BSN_PRSS_C AND A.BRC = E.BRC LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F ON E.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_C AND E.BSN_PRSS_C = F.BSN_PRSS_C AND F.LVL_NO = 4 AND F.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F3 ON F.GRP_ORG_C = F3.GRP_ORG_C AND F.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F3.BSN_PRSS_C AND F3.LVL_NO = 3 AND F3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F2 ON F3.GRP_ORG_C = F2.GRP_ORG_C AND F3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F2.BSN_PRSS_C AND F2.LVL_NO = 2 AND F2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F1 ON F2.GRP_ORG_C = F1.GRP_ORG_C AND F2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F1.BSN_PRSS_C AND F1.LVL_NO = 1 AND F1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP G ON A.GRP_ORG_C = G.GRP_ORG_c AND G.ENO = A.VLR_ENO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' ) A , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , BSN_PRSS_C , BRC , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '01', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '02', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '03', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '04', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_BSN_TPC, '05', COIC_YN)) BSN_COIC_YN5 FROM TB_OR_BH_BSNTP_EVL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC ) B , ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , BSN_PRSS_C , BRC , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '01', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN1 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '02', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN2 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '03', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN3 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '04', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN4 , MIN(DECODE(BCP_IFN_DSC, '05', COIC_YN)) IFN_COIC_YN5 FROM TB_OR_BH_SSPIFN_EVL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC ) C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B.BSN_PRSS_C(+) AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C(+) AND A.BRC = B.BRC(+) AND A.BRC = C.BRC(+)

sql.name: SQL12

sql.name: SQL13

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OM_SCHD SET BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC = '02' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_BH_PRCD_BSN WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BIA_YY = TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BH_PRCD_BSN ( GRP_ORG_C, BIA_YY, BRC, BSN_PRSS_C , BSN_PRSS_C, PRCD_BRC , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#bia_yy#), TRIM(#chrg_brc#), TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#) , TRIM(#f_bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#prd_brc#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL_DCZ ( GRP_ORG_C, BAS_YM, DCZ_SQNO, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC, DCZ_DT, DCZMN_ENO , BIA_DCZ_STSC, RTN_CNTN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#bas_ym#), ( SELECT (DCZ_SQNO) AS DCZ_SQNO FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL WHERE BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#bas_ym#) ) , TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#brc#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), TRIM(#sch_bia_evl_prg_stsc#) , #sch_rtn_cntn#, SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL SET BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC = TRIM(#sch_bia_evl_prg_stsc#) , QSN_RG_YN = 'Y' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) , DCZ_SQNO = DCZ_SQNO+1 WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_bia_yy#)||'%%' --AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BSN_PRSS_C, B4.BSN_PRSNM, A.BRC, C.BRNM , B1.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV1, B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1 , B2.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV2, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSS_C BSN_PRSS_LV3, B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3 FROM TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = 4 AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = 3 AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = 2 AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = 1 AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ORDER BY C.BRNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B1.BSN_PRSNM

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM , SUBSTR(A.BAS_YM,0,4) RA_SC , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DCZ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') DCZ_DT , C.INTG_IDVD_CNM RA_DCZNM, B.RA_DCZ_STSC FROM TB_OR_BH_RA A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RADCZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND SUBSTR(A.BAS_YM,0,4) = SUBSTR(B.BAS_YM,0,4) AND A.DCZ_SQNO = B.DCZ_SQNO INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.RA_DCZ_STSC = C.IDVDC_VAL AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'RA_DCZ_STSC' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ORDER BY A.BAS_YM DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.DCZ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') DCZ_DT , C.INTG_IDVD_CNM RA_DCZNM, B.RA_DCZ_STSC FROM TB_OR_BH_RA A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RADCZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = B.BAS_YM AND A.DCZ_SQNO = B.DCZ_SQNO INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.RA_DCZ_STSC = C.IDVDC_VAL AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'RA_DCZ_STSC' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ORDER BY A.BAS_YM DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BAS_YM, A.RSK_C, B1.RSK_PFRNM F_PFRNM, B2.RSK_PFRNM S_PFRNM, B3.RSK_PFRNM , A.BZPL_ACS_IMP_YN, A.HMRS_LSS_YN, A.IPT_RESC_IPMT_YN , A.SYS_UG_IMP_YN, A.DOFE_SPT_SSP_YN, A.BCP_AMN_OBJ_YN , A.RA_X_RSNC, A.X_RSNCTT, A.NATV_RSK_EVL_SCR, A.RSK_CTL_SUV_CNTN , A.RM_RSK_EVL_SCR, C.RM_RSK_GRDNM, A.RM_RSK_GRD_C , A.RSK_MTG_ACT_CNTN, RA_DCZ_STSC, F.CHRG_EMPNM, F.ENO, F.TEAM_CD, G.BRNM FROM TB_OR_BH_RA A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RSK_C = B3.RSK_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_RSK_C = B2.RSK_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_RSK_C = B1.RSK_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_BC_RMRSK_GRD C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RM_RSK_GRD_C = C.RM_RSK_GRD_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RA D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = D.BAS_YM INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_RADCZ E ON D.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND SUBSTR(D.BAS_YM,0,4) = SUBSTR(E.BAS_YM,0,4) AND D.DCZ_SQNO = E.DCZ_SQNO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_c AND F.ENO = A.VLR_ENO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ G ON A.GRP_ORG_C = G.GRP_ORG_C AND F.TEAM_CD = G.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_ra_sc#)||'%%'

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND A.BCP_AMN_OBJ_YN = TRIM(#st_bcp_amn_obj_yn#)

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: ORDER BY A.RSK_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BH_RADCZ ( GRP_ORG_C, BAS_YM, DCZ_SQNO , DCZ_DT, DCZMN_ENO, RA_DCZ_STSC , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#ra_sc#), '1' , TRIM(REPLACE(#today#, '-', '')), TRIM(#userid#), '01' , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BH_RA ( GRP_ORG_C, BAS_YM, RSK_C , BZPL_ACS_IMP_YN, HMRS_LSS_YN, IPT_RESC_IPMT_YN , SYS_UG_IMP_YN, DOFE_SPT_SSP_YN, BCP_AMN_OBJ_YN , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#ra_sc#), RSK_C , 'Y', 'Y', 'Y' , 'Y', 'Y', 'Y' , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_BC_RKFCTR WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LVL_NO = '3'

sql.name: SQL12

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B.RM_RSK_GRD_C , CASE WHEN ( B.RNGE_MIN_VAL <= TRIM(#hd_rm_rsk_evl_scr#) AND TRIM(#hd_rm_rsk_evl_scr#) < B.RNGE_MAX_VAL) THEN B.RM_RSK_GRDNM END AS RM_RSK_GRDNM FROM TB_OR_BH_RA A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_RMRSK_GRD B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#st_ra_sc#)||'%%' AND A.RSK_C = TRIM(#hd_rsk_c#) AND (CASE WHEN (B.RNGE_MIN_VAL <= TRIM(#hd_rm_rsk_evl_scr#) AND TRIM(#hd_rm_rsk_evl_scr#) < B.RNGE_MAX_VAL) THEN B.RM_RSK_GRDNM END) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.RSK_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT (A.SUM1+B.SUM2) NATV_RSK_EVL_SCR FROM ( SELECT (A.SCR * B.WVAL_RTO) SUM1 FROM TB_OR_BH_NARK_SCR A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_NARKHD B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_NARKDS C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.NATV_RSK_DSC = C.NATV_RSK_DSC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.NATV_RSK_DTLC = TRIM(#bcp_01#) AND B.NATV_RSK_HDNG_C = TRIM(#hd_bcp_01#) ) A , ( SELECT (A.SCR * B.WVAL_RTO) SUM2 FROM TB_OR_BH_NARK_SCR A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_NARKHD B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_NARKDS C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.NATV_RSK_DSC = C.NATV_RSK_DSC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.NATV_RSK_DTLC = TRIM(#bcp_02#) AND B.NATV_RSK_HDNG_C = TRIM(#hd_bcp_02#) ) B

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.SORT, A.OBT_RCVR_HRNM, NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT FROM (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, INTG_IDVD_CNM OBT_RCVR_HRNM , IDVDC_VAL OBT_RCVR_HR_C , CASE WHEN IDVDC_VAL = '01' THEN '최우선재개 업무' WHEN IDVDC_VAL = '02' THEN '최우선재개 업무' WHEN IDVDC_VAL = '03' THEN '우선재개 업무' WHEN IDVDC_VAL = '04' THEN '우선재개 업무' WHEN IDVDC_VAL = '05' THEN '자체재개 업무' END AS SORT FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND INTG_GRP_C = 'OBT_RCVR_HR_C' ) A , (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, OBT_RCVR_HR_C , COUNT(OBT_RCVR_HR_C) CNT FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#)

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BAS_YM, OBT_RCVR_HR_C ) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.OBT_RCVR_HR_C = B.OBT_RCVR_HR_C(+) ORDER BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.OBT_RCVR_HR_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) AND A.OBT_RCVR_HR_C = TRIM(#hd_obt_rcvr_hr_c#) ORDER BY B1.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , C.DSQNO, C.IPT_INFNM, C.IPT_INF_FORM_C, C.STRG_LOCNM , C.BKUP_YN, C.BKUP_FORM_C, C.BKUP_FQC, C.PLCNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_IPTINF C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = C.BAS_YM AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) ORDER BY B1.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, C.DSQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , C.DSQNO, C.ENO, D.CHRG_EMPNM, E.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS PZCNM, C.CHRG_BSNNM, C.MPNO , C.EMAIL_ADR, C.OHSE_ADR, C.OHSE_TELNO, A.BSN_PRSS_C , C.RCVR_HMRS_DSC, A.BRC FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_NED_HMRS C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = C.BAS_YM AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP D ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND C.ENO = D.ENO LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE E ON D.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND E.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' AND E.IDVDC_VAL = D.PZCC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) AND C.RCVR_HMRS_DSC = TRIM(#hd_rcvr_hmrs_dsc#) ORDER BY B1.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, C.DSQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , C.DSQNO, C.CONM, C.DEPTNM, C.CHRG_EMPNM, C.PZCNM, C.CHRG_BSNNM , C.MPNO, C.EMAIL_ADR, C.OFFC_TELNO, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_PALS_RLR C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = C.BAS_YM AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) ORDER BY B1.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, C.DSQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT B1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, B2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , B3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, B4.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 , C.DSQNO, C.BZS_DEVCNM, C.QT, C.UG_UZ_EXPL, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_BM_BIAEVL A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.LVL_NO = '4' AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.LVL_NO = '3' AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.LVL_NO = '2' AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.LVL_NO = '1' AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BAS_YM = C.BAS_YM AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) ORDER BY B1.BSN_PRSNM, B2.BSN_PRSNM, B3.BSN_PRSNM, B4.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, C.DSQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BRC, B.BRNM, C.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS PZCNM, A.ENO, A0.CHRG_EMPNM, A0.OFFC_TEL_CNTN FROM TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP A0 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = A0.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ENO = A0.ENO INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A0.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' AND C.IDVDC_VAL = A0.PZCC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#) ORDER BY NVL(A0.PZCC,'XX'), A0.ENO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_IPTINF SET IPT_INFNM = TRIM(#ipt_infnm#) , IPT_INF_FORM_C = TRIM(#ipt_inf_form_c#) , STRG_LOCNM = TRIM(#strg_locnm#) , BKUP_YN = TRIM(#bkup_yn#) , BKUP_FORM_C = TRIM(#bkup_form_c#) , BKUP_FQC = TRIM(#bkup_fqc#) , PLCNM = TRIM(#plcnm#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_NED_HMRS SET BRC = TRIM(#brc2#) , ENO = TRIM(#eno2#) , CHRG_BSNNM = TRIM(#chrg_bsnnm2#) , MPNO = TRIM(#mpno2#) , EMAIL_ADR = TRIM(#email_adr2#) , OHSE_ADR = TRIM(#ohse_adr2#) , OHSE_TELNO = TRIM(#ohse_telno2#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c2#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno2#) AND RCVR_HMRS_DSC = TRIM(#rcvr_hmrs_dsc2#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_PALS_RLR SET CONM = TRIM(#conm#) , DEPTNM = TRIM(#deptnm#) , CHRG_EMPNM = TRIM(#chrg_empnm#) , PZCNM = TRIM(#pzcnm#) , CHRG_BSNNM = TRIM(#chrg_bsnnm#) , MPNO = TRIM(#mpno#) , EMAIL_ADR = TRIM(#email_adr#) , OFFC_TELNO = TRIM(#offc_telno#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c4#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno4#)

sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_BH_NED_BZDE SET BZS_DEVCNM = TRIM(#bzs_devcnm#) , QT = TRIM(#qt#) , UG_UZ_EXPL = TRIM(#ug_uz_expl#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BAS_YM = TRIM(#st_bia_evl_sc#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c5#) AND DSQNO = TRIM(#dsqno5#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A1.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV1, A2.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV2 , A3.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV3, A.BSN_PRSNM BSN_PRSNM_LV4 FROM TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT A INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT A3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = A3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = A3.BSN_PRSS_C AND A.LVL_NO = 4 AND A3.LVL_NO = 3 AND A3.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT A2 ON A3.GRP_ORG_C = A2.GRP_ORG_C AND A3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = A2.BSN_PRSS_C AND A2.LVL_NO = 2 AND A2.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT A1 ON A2.GRP_ORG_C = A1.GRP_ORG_C AND A2.UP_BSN_PRSS_c = A1.BSN_PRSS_C AND A1.LVL_NO = 1 AND A1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_BH_DZST_CFT_UGBR B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B.BSN_PRSS_C AND A.LVL_NO = 4 WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#)

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND B.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: ORDER BY A1.BSN_PRSNM, A2.BSN_PRSNM, A3.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSNM

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.BSN_PRSNM , A.BSN_PRSS_C , A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C , A.LVL_NO "LEVEL" , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, '>'),'[^>]+',1,1) LV1_BSN_PRSS_C , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, '>'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV2_BSN_PRSS_C , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, '>'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV3_BSN_PRSS_C , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, '>'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,1) LV1_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV2_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV3_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV4_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,1) LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, '>'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND VLD_YN = 'Y' ) A START WITH A.BSN_PRSS_C = '05000000' CONNECT BY A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BSN_PRSS_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BRC, B.BRNM FROM TB_OR_BH_DZST_CFT_UGBR A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC AND B.UYN = 'Y' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#lv4_bsn_prss_c#) ORDER BY B.BRNM

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT CONCAT('0', MAX(BSN_PRSS_C)+1) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND UP_BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#lv3_bsn_prss_c#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_BC_DZST_CFT ( GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BSN_PRSNM , ENG_BSN_PRSNM, LVL_NO, UP_BSN_PRSS_C, VLD_YN , VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#lv4_bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#lv4_bsn_prsnm#) , TRIM(#lv4_eng_bsn_prsnm#), 4, TRIM(#lv3_bsn_prss_c#), 'Y' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )
